org.kitteh.irc.client.library.feature.auth

Class AbstractSaslProtocol<AuthValue>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitteh.irc.client.library.feature.auth.AbstractUserProtocol
      • org.kitteh.irc.client.library.feature.auth.AbstractSaslProtocol<AuthValue>
  • Type Parameters:
    AuthValue - authentication value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthProtocol, EventListening, Username
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SaslECDSANIST256PChallenge, SaslExternal, SaslPlain

    public abstract class AbstractSaslProtocol<AuthValue>
extends AbstractUserProtocol
implements EventListening
    SASL authentication. Automatically attempts auth during connection.
